attributes.title: i’m not hating i’m just tellin you😔😔😔
attributes.review:
this app is completely unacceptable to be on the appstore. i downloaded it simply to maybe provide information as to why i should support our racist, rapist, homophobic, anti feminist president, hopefully gain important knowledge. when it asked me to confirm me downloading the app i had to then confirm if i wanted to sacrifice myself to be one of the big orange’s maids. i didn’t want anyone going through with that in my family and frankly didn’t believe it so i confirmed anyways. 😢😢 BIGGEST MISTAKE OF MY LIFE. he flew me out to mars and let me starve for three hundred sixty five thousand seven hundred twenty two one earth days. as i was FAMISHED waiting on him to please come back for me because BOY did i have some words for him. but instead he sent his big fat orange oompa loompas carrying aliens. they then replaced me with the aliens on mars and said it was all a big misunderstanding. while i was on mars the aliens had cause world war three with ✨💕the mystical cheeto✨💕 and my home was destroyed. they offered me a bedroom in the white house with them, but i told them i’d rather eat myself then stay in the same white house as an alive orange. so i stayed on a bench in a park that night. i awoke to an orange staring at me in a VERY disturbing way. homie was literally watching me sleep. anyways he sent his storm troopers to come kill me but little does he know i’m darth vader. so who’s the clown now donald? 🥰🥰✨💕😌. anyways my storm troopers were brain demolished so they believed everything that donald told them. guess they weren’t true beliebers. 😒😒. but they ended up murdering me. so i’m writing this review with spongebob in heaven rn eating cotton candy. DONT GET THIS APP. you will die. literally. and president donald trump? i have ABSOLUTELY no words for you😔.
and remember kids, i’m not hating i’m just tellin you😕, i’m tryna let you know what the frick that i’ve been through😔😔😔

attributes.title: WTH
attributes.review:
Every time I use this app EVERYTHING I EAT TASTES LIKE 🍊 I just wanted to learn about our
🍊 president but EVERYTHING IN MY ROOM IS TURNING TO ORANGES

attributes.title: Tehe
attributes.review:
It just bad in general so instead stan bts 😹 저 수많은 별을 맞기 위해 난 떨어졌던가 hey yeah
저 수천 개 찬란한 화살의 과녁은 나 하나
Eh, you've shown me I have reasons
I should love myself, ah huh
내 숨 내 걸어온 길 전부로 답해
어제의 나 오늘의 나 내일의 나
(I'm learning how to love myself)
빠짐없이 남김없이 모두 다 나
정답은 없을지도 몰라
어쩜 이것도 답은 아닌 거야
그저 날 사랑하는 일조차 누구의 허락이 필요했던 거야
난 지금도 나를 또 찾고 있어
But 더는 죽고 싶지가 않은 걸
슬프던 me
아프던 me
더 아름다울 미
